All hail the new guy, which would be >>>me<<<, heh heh.  Well I'm a
long-time fan of the game.  It's the only game that I still play from
my DOS days (other than Doom).  I'm surprised this game doesn't get
more credit than it does; it's brilliant!

See the Grand Master in action!!
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v81/ericmelech/grandmaster.png
